title: Clinical Support Specialist (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:
Apply online

Clinical Support Specialist
(m/f)

VPM_C11905
Innsbruck, Austria

Main Tasks

  • Clinical support for the middle ear implant (VIBRANT SOUNDBRIDGE), the bone conduction implant (BONEBRIDGE) as well as the bone conduction system (ADHEAR)
  • Support of our subsidiaries, distributors, clinics and patients in Turkey and Middle East (patient selection, product-related support in the OR, audio processor fitting)
  • Preparation and performance of trainings, webinars and product presentations; customer support at conventions and workshops
  • Support of market development and product improvement
  • Customer and product-specific data analysis and preparation of technical documentation and training materials

Requirements

  • Degree in a technical field or life sciences, e.g. biomedical engineering, electrical engineering, medical engineering, physics, mechatronics
  • First professional experience in audiology, audiometry or medicine is a plus but not required
  • Very good command of written and spoken German and English
  • Team player with highly motivated and independent approach, positive appearance
  • Flexibility and willingness to travel, driver’s license (B) required




Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44


We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com



Apply online

MED-EL Medical Electronics
